photon_mass_constraint.name: photon_mass_constraint
photon_mass_constraint.author: QFD Framework
photon_mass_constraint.description: Enforces experimental limits on photon mass
photon_mass_constraint.constraint_description: Enforces experimental upper limit on photon mass (m_γ < 1×10⁻¹⁸ eV)

vacuum_stability.name: vacuum_stability
vacuum_stability.author: QFD Framework
vacuum_stability.description: Ensures vacuum stability under QFD parameter modifications
vacuum_stability.constraint_description: Ensures vacuum stability by maintaining n_vac = 1 and checking parameter combinations

cosmological_constant.name: cosmological_constant
cosmological_constant.author: QFD Framework
cosmological_constant.description: Enforces consistency with observed cosmological constant
cosmological_constant.constraint_description: Enforces consistency with observed cosmological constant (Λ = 1.10e-52 m⁻²)
